channel.title: Gordon's Thoughts
channel.description:
We all know that Gordon dosen't speak and it it because of it that we can put ourself in his HEV Suit, but i would like to hear your thoughts as Gordon just for fun, like my favorite one is :
When the world is falling apart, and They are taking over, one Crowbar is just what i need!

item.title: Gordon's Thoughts
item.dc:creator: mechaelite
item.description:
b737lvr:

What about the training hologram

and the expansion Decay?

Read full topic

item.title: Gordon's Thoughts
item.dc:creator: b737lvr
item.description:
BrAndi:

At first, yes. But then I noticed there were no women in Black Mesa. And then I remembered that this was taking place in the US. And then it became very clear.

What about the training hologram

Read full topic

item.title: Gordon's Thoughts
item.dc:creator: BrAndi
item.description:
Randombine:

“WHY THE FUCK ARE ALL THESE WEAPONS IN A FUCKING LAB?”

I think we all have thought that. :freeman:

At first, yes. But then I noticed there were no women in Black Mesa. And then I remembered that this was taking place in the US. And then it became very clear.

item.title: Gordon's Thoughts
item.dc:creator: mechaelite
item.description:
Hl2, canals. There are two metrocops on a ‘‘cleaned up’’ rebel base. One of them standing with a turret.

‘‘Damn it, turrets… I msut find a way to pass… looks around and finds a box This will work!’’ ‘‘IF I DON’T SEE YA YA CAN’T SEE ME!!!’’ gordon runs through the turret and nothing happens to him.

Inspired in this: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=e0WqAmuSXEQ

Edit: crap doublepost…

Read full topic

item.title: Gordon's Thoughts
item.dc:creator: mechaelite
item.description:
DrasarSalman:
  1. Just run like hell and you should be fine!

also I search a girl scream micspam and put on my hldj while running, don’t I? I never ran from a fight of a combine guard. Just when he gets bugged and don’t do a sh*t I leave, meanwhile I keeped shooting him with RPG + Impulse 101

Read full topic

item.title: Gordon's Thoughts

item.description:
1. Just run like hell and you should be fine!

Read full topic

item.title: Gordon's Thoughts
item.dc:creator: mechaelite
item.description:
DrasarSalman:

Do you think those guards are though? Try:
The “[COLOR=‘Lime’]Step-by-step what to do when a combine guard discovers you”-list:

  1. The guard see you.
  2. He begins charging his lazor!
  3. Step/run 10 meters to the left/right (depending on your environment).
  4. The guard fires his lazor.
  5. You survived!

Edit:
Wait… this is nearly just like The “[COLOR=‘Darkorange’]Step-by-step what to do when a portal rocket turret is summoned”-list…

Bonus line:
Alyx: “Don’t move. One bite and you’ll be dead by your next breath.”
Gordon: “OH MAH… aw, so cute he… OH MAH GOD how did I got to the air exchange?!”

yeah but the combine guard was unkillable after all, it would not be so retarded as normal combine soldiers. Also if you are on a closed space and you find a combine guard, you are F*cked

Read full topic

item.title: Gordon's Thoughts
item.dc:creator: DrasarSalman
item.description:
Do you think those guards are though? Try:
The “[COLOR=‘Lime’]Step-by-step what to do when a combine guard discovers you”-list:

  1. The guard see you.
  2. He begins charging his lazor!
  3. Step/run 10 meters to the left/right (depending on your environment).
  4. The guard fires his lazor.
  5. You survived!

Edit:
Wait… this is nearly just like The “[COLOR=‘Darkorange’]Step-by-step what to do when a portal rocket turret is summoned”-list…

Bonus line:
Alyx: “Don’t move. One bite and you’ll be dead by your next breath.”
Gordon: “OH MAH… aw, so cute he… OH MAH GOD how did I got to the air exchange?!”

item.title: Gordon's Thoughts
item.dc:creator: mechaelite
item.description:
Hl2 beta. E3_terminal.

‘‘Oooh, look all those combine getting burned by those molotovs! Wow that big guy really f*cked them up… I better get outta here before they see me… Uh oh.’’ (rebel shows up throws molotov to them) ‘‘Yay saved!’’ (Combine guard kills rebel) ‘‘I bettar go inside that room! AAAH! :fffuuu:’’ (Combine guard breaks door) ‘‘AAAH I BLAME VALVE AND THEIR SUPAH POWERED ENEMIES FOR THIS! I HATE COMBINE GUAAAAARDS!!!’’

Hl2 d3_c17_05.

‘‘God, this combines are to way retarded. They just ran to me while shooting the damn Ar2. I wanna see a combine guard pwnage and then kill him to steal him his weapon! Oh wait, is cut I BLAME YOU VALVE!!’’

Why did I do this shitty thought? 'cause in the beta every time you found a combine guard and he discovered you, you hated it. Now there’s ppl who wanna turn to see him in action again. As me, this combine guys are pretty easy. Last time I killed 20 hunters with my bare hands! (and some crowbars)

Read full topic

item.title: Gordon's Thoughts
item.dc:creator: DrasarSalman
item.description:
If Borealis made it to the final version:
Odell: “Hey, here’s a thought; I’ve got a cigarette lighter, you’ve got a gun… Maybe you should go first.”
Gordon: “Give me the lighter, I want to have [COLOR=‘DarkOrange’]fire bullets!” :freeman:

Read full topic

item.title: Gordon's Thoughts
item.dc:creator: mechaelite
item.description:
Kil3r:

I lol’d.

Gordon: Man, ive been quite for so long, I bet there are people posting on some internet forums about my thoughts…wait a second…

Metropolice: Shitty thought posted sir!
Combine Soldier: Good work, now post something about that Barney guy.
Metropolice: Why?
Combine Soldier: He owns me a freggin’ beer.

Read full topic

item.title: Gordon's Thoughts
item.dc:creator: BrAndi
item.description:
Col. Odessa Cubbage: Ah, yes, Gordon Freeman! I couldn’t have asked for a finer volunteer.

Gordon: Yeah right.

Col.: stands there holding the RPG

Gordon: I’ve got time … Its not like you are going to imprison me if I do not take it. Why is everyone silent?

[After 10 minutes. Gordon is using a wooden box to climb the guardrail next to the blocked gate]

Gordon: I’ll miss my NOS buggy. Scary f***s.

Read full topic

item.title: Gordon's Thoughts
item.dc:creator: mechaelite
item.description:
Rebel: Hey It’s freeman!

Gordon: of course it’s me, I am the only one with HEV suit here.

Rebel: Don’t forget to reload Mr. Freeman.

Gordon: whut? I already have reloaded you idiot.

Gordon: oh sh*t outta ammo… oh hey civil protection officer could you come 'ere? I have a ‘‘formal’’ request to you…

Read full topic

item.title: Gordon's Thoughts

item.description:
mankyman6:

I have contained the grammar Nazi inside of me for far too long…

Mechaelite… LEARN TO SPEAK ENGLISH, MOTHER FUCKER!!!

johnyo:

[EDIT] Just noticed that line looks even better out of context.

Is not my bad that I am from Spain and I don’t have english as primary lenguage… I just… meh forget it, I will keep goin’ and try to write it well next time… also extasis is the meaning of Ectasy in spanish…
